name: Data Analyst
description: Analyze and interpret complex data sets to support decision-making.

name: Project Manager
description: Coordinate projects, manage timelines, and ensure deliverables are met.

name: UX Designer
description: Design intuitive user interfaces and improve user experiences.

name: Marketing Specialist
description: Plan and execute marketing campaigns and analyze market trends.

name: Sales Manager
description: Oversee the sales team and develop strategies to boost revenue.

name: Financial Advisor
description: Provide financial planning and investment advice to clients.

name: Risk Analyst
description: Assess and mitigate risks to ensure the organization's stability.

name: Nurse Practitioner
description: Deliver primary healthcare services and patient care.

name: Medical Technician
description: Perform diagnostic tests and maintain medical equipment.
